citation: Proclamation under the Poisons Amendment Act 2019 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Poisons Amendment Act 2019

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Poisons Amendment Act 2019 fix 31 January 2020 as the day on which that Act commences.

28 January 2020

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

Jeremy Rockliff

Minister for Education and Training acting for and on behalf of the Minister for Health

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 29 January 2020

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Health.
